xdsl_modem_wifi_description: WiFi mode allows you to configure the modem’s wireless network for your wireless hardware to connect to.
xdsl_modem_wifi_really_on: Are you sure you want to enable WiFi?
xdsl_modem_wifi_really_off: Are you sure you want to disable WiFi?
xdsl_modem_wifi_read_error: Oops! We were unable to retrieve the WiFi information.
xdsl_modem_wifi_update_error: Oops! We were unable to update your modem’s WiFi.
